answers.answer: I'm not a health professional, but am a heart patient who has a lot of experience with angina.  Obviously you aren't showing laboratory or electrical reasons for heart pain, so it doesn't sound like a cardiac issue.  Have you been given Nitro spray or tablets to take when you get a pain?  Generally, if your pains are heart related, the chest pain will go away, but get ready for what can be quite a headache.  I'd try taking aspirin or advil and see if that helps.  Angina at your age is extremely rare, unless you are aging prematurely because of diabetes, inactivity, obesity or very poor diet.

question: hi im a 33 YO male and im having this ache in my left side chest close to my  collar bone and shoulder, the thing is that i feel sick and with nausea and it last for days, i cant sleep or have a normal life it feels like im going to pass out or die, i go to emergency room every 2 days at least but ekg and cardiac enzymes are normal every time. im desperate is this angina?? im scared to death
title: desperate
